Uses of Class
jsx.http.rpc.XMLHttpRemote

Packages that use XMLHttpRemote
jsx.http.rpc Facilitates mechanism for RPC based on HTTP serialization. 
jsx.http.rpc.remote Facilitates client-side for remote object services based on XMLHTTP serialized RPC mechanism. 
jsx.http.rpc.server Facilitates server-side for RPC based on HTTP serialization. 
 

Uses of XMLHttpRemote in jsx.http.rpc

          A typical constructor for creating fields of this type.

Uses of XMLHttpRemote in jsx.http.rpc.remote
 

Subclasses of XMLHttpRemote in jsx.http.rpc.remote
 class Reflector
          A base class of the client-side providers for remote reflect services.
 class Remote
          A base class for objects that support remote reflect services.
 class RemoteReflector
          An abstract base class for remote reflect service providers.
 

Uses of XMLHttpRemote in jsx.http.rpc.server
 

Subclasses of XMLHttpRemote in jsx.http.rpc.server

          A base class of the server-side providers for remote reflect services.
